text: Jack Brodie Farris (December 5, 1935 â€“ December 14, 2019) was a United States Army Lieutenant General. He commanded the military ground forces during Operation Urgent Fury, the United States invasion of Grenada in 1983; at the time of his retirement in 1991 he was Deputy Commander of the United States Pacific Command in Hawaii. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:Military people from North Carolina
title: Jack B. Farris
